## About Me

I am an MHS student studying Epidemiology at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. I am excited to start my program here! I am originally from Colorado, and I completed my undergraduate degree at the University of Washington in Seattle.

## Study Interests

I am interested in using spatial analysis to explore the distribution of nutrition-related outcomes to study the disparities and their connection to the social determinants of health.
